plot: Family drama about a father who is so caught up in himself and his hate to Christianity and ends up pushing his children away, one by one.
title: I brændingen
plot_es: Family drama about a father who is so caught up in himself and his hate to Christianity and ends up pushing his children away, one by one.
plot_en: Family drama about a father who is so caught up in himself and his hate to Christianity and ends up pushing his children away, one by one.
